verses.verse: תְּפִלָּ֗ה <WH8605> A Prayer לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David הַטֵּֽה־ <WH5186> Bow down יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> O LORD אָזְנְךָ֣ <WH241> thine ear עֲנֵ֑נִי <WH6030> hear כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For עָנִ֖י <WH6041> me for I [am] poor וְאֶבְי֣וֹן <WH34> and needy אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

שָֽׁמְרָ֣ה <WH8104> Preserve נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> my soul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> I am a חָסִ֪יד <WH2623> for I [am] holy אָ֥נִי <WH589> I הוֹשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> save עַ֭בְדְּךָ <WH5650> thy servant אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You אֱלֹהַ֑י <WH430> O thou my God הַבּוֹטֵ֥חַ <WH982> that trusteth אֵלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH413> about
חָנֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> Be merciful אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> unto me O Lord כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> to אֶ֝קְרָ֗א <WH7121> for I cry כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> unto thee daily

שַׂ֭מֵּחַ <WH8055> Rejoice נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> the soul עַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> of thy servant כִּ֥י <WH3588> for אֵלֶ֥יךָ <WH413> to אֲ֝דֹנָ֗י <WH136> for unto thee O Lord נַפְשִׁ֥י <WH5315> my soul אֶשָּֽׂא׃ <WH5375> do I lift up

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> You אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> For thou Lord ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [art] good וְסַלָּ֑ח <WH5546> and ready to forgive וְרַב־ <WH7227> and plenteous חֶ֝֗סֶד <WH2617> in mercy לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all קֹרְאֶֽיךָ׃ <WH7121> unto all them that call

הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <WH238> Give ear יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> O LORD תְּפִלָּתִ֑י <WH8605> unto my prayer וְ֝הַקְשִׁ֗יבָה <WH7181> and attend בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> to the voice תַּחֲנוּנוֹתָֽי׃ <WH8469> of my supplications
בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> In the day צָ֭רָתִ֥י <WH6869> of my trouble אֶקְרָאֶ֗ךָּ <WH7121> I will call כִּ֣י <WH3588> for תַעֲנֵֽנִי׃ <WH6030> upon thee for thou wilt answer

אֵין־ <WH369> There כָּמ֖וֹךָ <WH3644> like בָאֱלֹהִ֥ים ׀ <WH430> Among the gods אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> [there is] none like unto thee O Lord וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is no כְּֽמַעֲשֶֽׂיךָ׃ <WH4639> neither [are there any works] like unto thy works

כָּל־ <WH3605> All גּוֹיִ֤ם ׀ <WH1471> All nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom עָשִׂ֗יתָ <WH6213> whom thou hast made יָב֤וֹאוּ ׀ <WH935> shall come וְיִשְׁתַּחֲו֣וּ <WH7812> and worship לְפָנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> before אֲדֹנָ֑י <WH136> thee O Lord וִֽיכַבְּד֣וּ <WH3513> and shall glorify לִשְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> thy name

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָד֣וֹל <WH1419> For thou [art] great אַ֭תָּה <WH859> you וְעֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> and doest נִפְלָא֑וֹת <WH6381> wondrous things אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> thou [art] God לְבַדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH905> alone

ה֘וֹרֵ֤נִי <WH3384> Teach יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> O LORD דַּרְכֶּ֗ךָ <WH1870> me thy way אֲהַלֵּ֥ךְ <WH1980> I will walk בַּאֲמִתֶּ֑ךָ <WH571> in thy truth יַחֵ֥ד <WH3161> unite לְ֝בָבִ֗י <WH3824> my heart לְיִרְאָ֥ה <WH3372> to fear שְׁמֶֽךָ׃ <WH8034> thy name

אוֹדְךָ֤ ׀ <WH3034> I will praise אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> thee O Lord אֱ֭לֹהַי <WH430> my God בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all לְבָבִ֑י <WH3824> with all my heart וַאֲכַבְּדָ֖ה <WH3513> and I will glorify שִׁמְךָ֣ <WH8034> thy name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> for evermore

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> [is] thy mercy גָּד֣וֹל <WH1419> For great עָלָ֑י <WH5921> toward וְהִצַּ֥לְתָּ <WH5337> toward me and thou hast delivered נַ֝פְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> my soul מִשְּׁא֥וֹל <WH7585> hell תַּחְתִּיָּֽה׃ <WH8482> from the lowest

אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> O God זֵ֘דִ֤ים <WH2086> the proud קָֽמוּ־ <WH6965> are risen עָלַ֗י <WH5921> against וַעֲדַ֣ת <WH5712> against me and the assemblies עָ֭רִיצִים <WH6184> of violent בִּקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> [men] have sought נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> after my soul וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> have not שָׂמ֣וּךָ <WH7760> and have not set לְנֶגְדָּֽם׃ <WH5048> before

וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> O אֲ֭דֹנָי <WH136> But thou O Lord אֵל־ <WH410> [art] a God רַח֣וּם <WH7349> full of compassion וְחַנּ֑וּן <WH2587> and gracious אֶ֥רֶךְ <WH750> Slow אַ֝פַּ֗יִם <WH639> to anger וְרַב־ <WH7227> and plenteous חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> in mercy וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> and truth

פְּנֵ֥ה <WH6437> O turn אֵלַ֗י <WH413> to me וְחָ֫נֵּ֥נִי <WH2603> unto me and have mercy תְּנָֽה־ <WH5414> upon me give עֻזְּךָ֥ <WH5797> thy strength לְעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <WH5650> unto thy servant וְ֝הוֹשִׁ֗יעָה <WH3467> and save לְבֶן־ <WH1121> the son אֲמָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH519> of thine handmaid

עֲשֵֽׂה־ <WH6213> Shew עִמִּ֥י <WH5973> with א֗וֹת <WH226> me a token לְט֫וֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> for good וְיִרְא֣וּ <WH7200> me may see שֹׂנְאַ֣י <WH8130> that they which hate וְיֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> [it] and be ashamed כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אַתָּ֥ה <WH859> O יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> because thou LORD עֲזַרְתַּ֥נִי <WH5826> hast holpen וְנִחַמְתָּֽנִי׃ <WH5162> me and comforted
